movies.name: Inception
movies.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their deepest secrets.

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges, Batman must confront him to bring justice to Gotham City.

movies.name: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
